name: COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent v. Anthony JOHNSON, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Court of Common Pleas v. Johnson

parties: COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent v. Anthony JOHNSON, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of January, 2011, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
12 A.3d 289
COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent v. Anthony JOHNSON, Petitioner.
No. 106 EM 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 13, 2011.
